Experience.Title: Software Developer
Experience.Description: Developing C++ and C# .NET applications for managing in-house workflow. Integrating new functionality over an existing ERP system using various desktop and web technogolies. Monitoring an Asterisk phone system in real time. Developing automated labeling infrastructure using Bartender.

Projects.Name: pAInt
Projects.Description: Built at McHacks 2017, my team and I developed a lightweight web application where users can upload and image and stylize it to resemble any of a collection of 9 paintings. We developed code to train a generative convolutional neural network to perform this task. Currently I am working on implementing research by Dumoulin, et al. which uses a single trained network to generate images with any of 32 styles.
